scripts.start: test -d node_modules/strider/node_modules/bendigo-plugin || (SROOT=$(pwd); ln -sf $SROOT/bendigo-plugin ./node_modules/strider/node_modules ; cd ./node_modules/strider/node_modules/bendigo-plugin ; npm i  ; cd $SROOT; exec ./node_modules/strider/bin/strider) && exec ./node_modules/strider/bin/strider
